rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual information without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the location of latest cases and lacks explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment reports the latest cases were at farms but contains no bare negation.
Segment describes where the latest cases were, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports latest cases locations/types, not prices or metrics.
The segment reports case locations/types, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or attributed statement.
Factual report of latest case locations and flock types.
